Class Printer

java.lang.Object
kp.utils.Printer
public class Printer extends Object
A wrapper for 'Java Util Logging' with a simplified format.
It prints only the message without any other items (like date, level).

Because code using 'System.out.println' is noncompliant with SonarQube warnings, this utility class was created for the 'Miscellany' project.
